The beautifully updated kitchen offers granite countertops, tiled backsplash, stainless steel appliances, vinyl plank floors, and plenty of beautiful wood cabinets for storage. The updated bath features a tiled tub/shower,and granite vanity. The nicely sized bedroom features a large walk-in closet with plenty of space. title: A unique 1 bedroom 1.1 bath townhouse in The Ridings.
description: A unique 1 bedroom 1.1 bath townhouse in The Ridings, one of the 27 Villages of Chesterbrook. It is a quiet place, bright and sunny with high ceilings. Once you see this beautifully kept home in a serene setting, you will want to make it your home. Enter into a raised tile foyer area and step down into a large great room that is open from the front door to the rear patio that overlooks the creek. Enjoy the beautiful view while having your morning coffee sitting on the patio. Hardwood throughout the first floor with the newer kitchen that is fully equipped with a large peninsula, with all new stainless steel appliances. A powder room and laundry room finish the first floor. A wood fireplace with a tile hearth is the centerpiece of room. Upstairs is an open 1 bedroom that opens into a balcony overlooking the wooded area and the creek in the back. This location is a commuter's dream with access to the PA Turnpike, Interstate 76, and Routes 202 and 30 just minutes away.

title: Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital
description:
Now available for rent! Located in the heart of Graduate Hospital, situated amongst the dining and community gathering spaces that make this neighborhood one of Philly's most desireable, is a gorgeous 3 story brick-front townhome. An open floor plan and wide layout greets you as you enter this sophisticated, light-filled open concept living/dining space. The space enjoys an abundance of natural light owing to two west facing windows. The contemporary style pairs neutral walls with rich dark hardwood floors, and cabinetry, and shows off a grand white Quartz island with a striking waterfall feature. If a glamorous kitchen is what you’re looking for, you will be pleased with the newly renovated custom chef’s kitchen which is designed with generous storage space, specialized knife, spice and kitchen-tool drawers as well as hidden panel built-in garbage and recycling storage. If creating a welcoming space for family and visitors is your goal, the oversized island seats 5 comfortably and is perfect for entertaining or for casual family meals in the kitchen. Stainless steel appliances include a counter depth, side-by-side refrigerator, a 5-burner gas range, range hood and a dishwasher designed to disappear behind a cabinet panel. The second level of the home features wainscoting in the hallway along with two bedrooms plus a shared 3-piece bathroom. Both bedrooms are spacious and feature hardwood floors and ample closets. The hall bath features a tub/shower combo, plus a modern vanity, matching mirror and ample storage closet. The third floor is the primary suite level with an open plan to include a den/home office, perfect for working from home, or also perfect to finish as a nursery for a growing family. This room is also finished with wainscoting for a unique look. The bedroom area features high ceilings, hardwood floors, two windows, a large french door style double closet and an additional single closet with built-in shelving/storage. The private primary bathroom has a bathtub along with a separate stall shower, vanity and a third storage closet. Need more living space or a bonus room? The fully finished lower level is the perfect bonus space which can be used as a family room, exercise room, or additional guest space. It also features a convenient powder room. The home also has a rear patio, perfect for a bistro table and BBQ grill. Add some planters and enjoy your private city garden. With a WalkScore of 96, this home is within a short stroll to amazing Graduate Hospital destinations. It's located blocks from Julian Abel park, Chester Arthur School and a short walk from the many neighborhood restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and grocery stores. Easy access to public transportation, South Street, nearby Rittenhouse Square, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Sorry, no pets. No smoking.
759 S 22nd St

title: Quaint three-story home in Queen Village!
description:
Quaint three story home in Queen Village! Modern kitchen with granite countertops, light cabinets, all stainless steel appliances and ceramic tile floor opening to rear courtyard. Open floor plan with gleaming hardwood floors throughout the home. Architect designed amenities full of charm with modern details. Built in bookshelves in kitchen, stair wells, and bedrooms. Recessed lighting throughout. The second floor has its own suite with French doors opening to a bedroom with two closets, a large walk-in closet, and a full ceramic tiled bath with a linen closet. French doors open to a lovely new, secluded deck with built-in bench. The third floor main bedroom suite has a cathedral ceiling with exposed brick wall and decorative fireplace. There is a large walk-in closet and new spacious, well appointed full ceramic tile walk-in shower with recesses. Roof top efficient central air system. This house is immaculate and neutral. Walk Score 5/5. Enjoy the awesome lifestyle that Queen Village provides. Perfect blend of house and location! Available 1/1/2023

title: Sun-soaked studio apartment in the highly coveted Parc Rittenhouse
description:
Sun-soaked studio apartment in the highly coveted Parc Rittenhouse on Rittenhouse Square. Enter the home to find an open kitchen with granite countertops, modern cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and a washer/dryer. With Brazilian cherry wood floors throughout, the sun-lit living area is filled with natural light from its windows. The recently refurbished bathroom has new grey wood flooring, marble vanity countertop, and a shower/tub. Residents of Parc Rittenhouse enjoy world class amenities and services including a 24 hour doorman; an amenities suite including a state-of-the-art fitness center and resident lounge with pantry; media room; outdoor rooftop pool club with a large pool deck, full size pool, kids pool and hot tub; garage parking below the building for an additional fee (subject to availability); and three amazing restaurants on the ground floor, Stephen Starr’s Parc, Devon Seafood and Via Locusta.
219-29 S 18th St #411B

title: Modern three bedroom for rent
description: Beautiful 3 bedroom home with finished basement that can be used for entertainment or storage. Home will feature kitchen, nice sized dining room, living room and 3 spacious bedrooms with alot of closet space. New wall to Laminate throughout the house, fresh paint and brand new countertops and cabinets. If that wasnt enough, home also has a deck that you can walk straight into from the dining room. The living room and dining room has beautiful recessed lights that makes the room appear larger and brighter. There is also a attached garage that can be used as storage. Washer and dryer hook up can be added. The home is down the street from cobbs creek parkway. Minutes away from shopping and yeadon. University of Penn and drexel is about 10 minutes away. If you are interested and would like to move foward, give us a call or send us an email. Bad or no credit, we got you covered. 3rd party vouchers and payments are not accepted. Serious inquiries only.

title: Spacious Rittenhouse Apt with Central Air and Renovated Kitchen!
description: Spacious apartment with central air and a beautifully renovated kitchen and bathroom. It is located in the heart of Rittenhouse Square just blocks away from the breathtaking Rittenhouse Square Park, Trader Joes, and the Schuylkill River Trail. Pristine hardwood floors flow throughout the unit. Renovated kitchen offers granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and plenty of cabinet space. The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. The Walk Score for this building is 100. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, and L'Occitane en Provence. Dine out at Pietro's, Rouge, Devon, Parc, La Fontana della Citta, Rittenhouse Grill, Marathon on the Square, Pizzeria Vetri, The Black Sheep Pub & Restaurant, a.kitchen, Giuseppe & Sons, Estia, Dolce Italian, The Love, The Dandelion, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, The Continental Mid-town, and Harper's Garden. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Bluestone Lane, Ultimo and Elixr. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop for fresh flowers and seasonal produce at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday. There is so much to do in this area!
